person.persName: Shelton H. Lain (Madison County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of John Lane and Sally Lane. Married to Mildred Foley Lain in Madison County, Kentucky, on November 10, 1863. Postmaster in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Merchant in Madison County in 1863.
